text: from the hard work of rehearsals
to all the action on the set
get ready to take the stage with disney
channel's rocket this is the road to
camp rock 2 the final jam
the opening number for camp rock 2 sets
the tone for the movie the song brand
new day it's just a really fun
like peppy song about being excited to
start a new day at camp and a new day of
the summer
it's the first song anyone will hear
there's a strong message of having you
know all your friends together i think
it's everybody coming together and
having the same anthem it really opens
up the movie and tells where everybody
is and how they're feeling at the
beginning of the storyline shot at
multiple locations this song took the
longest to shoot
the song has led us all the way through
camp at the beach we started out then we
went into the woods for a little bit and
we went into the drum cabin finally here
we are in the main stage and had the
most challenges i have to wear a
sundress
and so here i am outside in a sundress
and like all of a sudden i look up and
there's snow flurries like falling down
and it starts snowing i believe uh
today's activity is to stay warm we
encountered a lot of rain that was a big
issue we had because so many of our
scenes are exterior outdoor shots it
can't be pouring rain that doesn't work
we have bees flying around us constantly
while we're shooting so you'll see our
eyes widen about a mile wide
and you just try and stay in character
as well as possible
mother nature definitely has to be on
our side in order for everything to work
out well keep watching for more behind
the scenes secrets and surprises on the
road to camp rock 2 the final jam camp
rock 2 the final premieres friday
september 3rd at 8 7 central on disney
channel
